tool_description: TranslAPI offers seamless text translation services with automatic language detection, supporting multiple languages. Streamline your applications with easy integration, ensuring accurate and efficient translations for diverse use cases.
name: TranslAPI
title: TranslAPI

api_list.name: Get supported languages
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of supported languages along with their abbreviations from the API. By making a GET request to this endpoint, you can obtain valuable information about the languages that the API recognizes and supports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/infos/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/infos/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
